name: Visage of Life
flavorText: The finger floats in your palm for a moment, and then the image of a young peasant appears. This finger did not, it seems, come from the prince as the villain claims.
text: Using a scrap of once-living material, you create an image of the living thing that produced that scrap. The image that appears before you is actual size and appears as the living thing did before its demise for the ritualâ€™s duration. Its pose is neutral and offers no information about the subject at its actual time of death.
